reviewText: The product gets stuck while playing and have to restart, sometimes take cd out and put back in apart from that as expected.  For the content 5 Stars

It was exactly what I was looking for as regards classical dressage teachings and explanations. The quality of taping is excellent!!!

At first I didnt' realize that it was in German and English and thought I had to send it back. Then I figured out how to get the English version.  Meanwhile, Amazon, - so efficient, had already issued a returns authorization and credited my account. I asked UPS to cancel return. I assume Amazon did  re-charge my account.  Thank you for excellent service.
